content: The University at Albany is seeking sponsors to help the DISPERSE Conference succeed and enable these potentially life-saving conversations.
Why Become a Sponsor of the DISPERSE 2022 Conference?
With an expected attendance of 800 people, your sponsorship not only ensures the success of the conference, but also greatly increases awareness of your institution or brand.
Increase your exposure and make your logo be seen by hundreds of attendees to the conference
Network with other sponsors and develop industry contacts
Show your support and designate yourself as a supporter in the movement to develop strategies to mitigate the effects of devastating severe weather events

Although we welcome any number of sponsorships at each of the sponsorship levels, we also have a limited number of individual sponsorship opportunities that offer additional benefits. Please see below for the individual sponsorship opportunities, and feel free to contact us to suggest alternative sponsorship options.
For more information on our sponsorship levels and available individual sponsorship opportunities, please refer to our Sponsorship Prospectus. Download Prospectus here.

Please contact Kayla Whitehouse ( kwhitehouse@albany.edu.) to finalize your sponsorship. To discuss any of the available sponsorship options, please contact us and we can assist you with any questions you may have.
